item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is the first post in this blog. I expect to be both post length and time between posts to be highly irregular.

item.title: About
item.description: Your host is Manuel Holtgrewe, computer scientist, bioinformatician (focus on medical genetics), scientist, engineer, technologist, nerd – not necessarily in this order.
